short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple companion app for ChronoSheets timesheets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the official companion app for ChronoSheets timesheets! Use this app to easily record timesheets while you're browsing. Simply login with your existing ChronoSheets account to get started.

You can switch between jobs & tasks, update your profile and edit timesheet entries you've already created with any of the ChronoSheets apps. If you're always using the browser while you work, this extension is super convenient - you won't have to change to a different window to record your timesheets. Just tap the extension icon to manage your timesheets.

Using the timer is really easy, simply choose your job code & task, then start the timer. If you need to switch to a different task, simply select the task and click "switch" - the timesheet entries will be automatically created as you do this.
